snippet: In his first public event the day after winning the Alabama and Mississippi primaries, Rick Santorum projected an air that seemed more ... presidential.
abstract: Republican presidential candidate Rick Santorum meets with Puerto Rico Gov Luis G Fortuno day after winning the Alabama and Mississippi primaries.

byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: In his first public event the day after winning the Alabama and Mississippi primaries, Rick Santorum projected an air that seemed more ... presidential.

headline.seo: Fortunes Turn, as Does Style, for Santorum
headline.main: Fortunes Turn, as Does Style, for Santorum
headline.print_headline: Rivals Regroup for the Next Stretch After 2 Southern Primaries: Fortunes Turn, As Does Style, For Santorum
